events.title: GI Bill Established
events.summary: The Servicemen's Readjustment Act provided tuition and living stipends for veterans without requiring loans.

events.title: Truman Commission Report
events.summary: Called for 'free or low-cost' public education through the first two years of college.

events.title: California Master Plan
events.summary: Established a three-tiered system providing affordable education to any qualified student.

events.title: Higher Education Act
events.summary: Created the Guaranteed Student Loan Program with federal guarantees against default.

events.title: Sallie Mae Created
events.summary: Congress established the Student Loan Marketing Association as a government-sponsored enterprise.

events.title: Middle Income Student Assistance Act
events.summary: Removed income restrictions on federally guaranteed student loans.

events.title: Education Amendments of 1980
events.summary: Increased borrowing limits and created PLUS loans for parents.

events.title: State Funding Decline Begins
events.summary: Between 1980-1985, state appropriations for higher education declined by 15% in inflation-adjusted dollars.

events.title: Bennett Hypothesis Proposed
events.summary: Secretary of Education William Bennett argued that federal aid enables colleges to raise tuition.

events.title: 1992 Higher Education Amendments
events.summary: Created unsubsidized loans available to all students regardless of need and removed PLUS loan limits.

events.title: Sallie Mae Privatization Begins
events.summary: Congress began the process of transforming Sallie Mae into a private corporation.

events.title: 90/10 Rule Established
events.summary: Required for-profit colleges to obtain at least 10% of revenue from non-federal sources.

events.title: For-Profit College Boom Begins
events.summary: For-profit colleges began a decade of explosive growth, increasing from 400,000 to over 2 million students by 2010.

events.title: Bankruptcy Reform Act (BAPCPA)
events.summary: Made private student loans non-dischargeable in bankruptcy, cementing the student debt trap.

events.title: Direct Lending Program
events.summary: Health Care and Education Reconciliation Act eliminated the FFEL Program, transitioning to Direct Lending.

events.title: Gainful Employment Regulations
events.summary: Obama administration attempted to create program-level accountability measures.

events.title: Student Debt Reaches $1 Trillion
events.summary: Total outstanding student loan debt surpassed $1 trillion for the first time.

events.title: Corinthian Colleges Collapse
events.summary: Federal aid restrictions led to the collapse of one of the largest for-profit college companies.

events.title: Navient Settlement
events.summary: Navient settled with 39 state attorneys general for $1.85 billion over allegations of servicing abuses.

events.title: Supreme Court Blocks Debt Relief
events.summary: The Supreme Court struck down the Biden administration's broad debt cancellation plan.

events.title: SAVE Repayment Plan
events.summary: Biden administration introduced the most generous income-driven repayment plan to date.
